plot: With the presence of a band, live audiences and special guests, Fernanda Lima hosts this weekly show, discussing many issues and taboos - all related to love and sex - in a dynamic and fun way.
plot_en: With the presence of a band, live audiences and special guests, Fernanda Lima hosts this weekly show, discussing many issues and taboos - all related to love and sex - in a dynamic and fun way.
plot_es: With the presence of a band, live audiences and special guests, Fernanda Lima hosts this weekly show, discussing many issues and taboos - all related to love and sex - in a dynamic and fun way.
title: Amor & Sexo
